pkgmetadata.longdescription: (Permuted) Brunner-Munzel Test // Provides the functions for Brunner-Munzel test and permuted Brunner-Munzel test, which enable to use formula, matrix, and table as argument. These functions are based on Brunner and Munzel (2000) doi:10.1002/(SICI)1521-4036(200001)42:1%3C17::AID- BIMJ17%3E3.0.CO;2-U and Neubert and Brunner (2007) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2006.05.024.
